FrierenMod:OrdinaryOffensiveMagic.NAME: Ordinary Offensive Magic
FrierenMod:OrdinaryOffensiveMagic.DESCRIPTION: Deal damage equal to twice the number of Mana Exhausted this combat.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: NL (Deals !D! damage.)

FrierenMod:DefensiveMagic.NAME: Defensive Magic
FrierenMod:DefensiveMagic.DESCRIPTION: frierenmod:Chant !CX!. Gain !B! Block. NL Add another *Defensive Magic into your hand.
FrierenMod:DefensiveMagic.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: frierenmod:Chant !CX!. Gain !B! Block. NL Add another *Defensive Magic+ into your hand.

FrierenMod:RapidChant.NAME: Rapid Chant
FrierenMod:RapidChant.DESCRIPTION: frierenmod:Chant !CX!. Shuffle one *Mana into your draw pile.
FrierenMod:RapidChant.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL frierenmod:Chant !CX!. Shuffle one *Mana into your draw pile.

FrierenMod:ManaConcealment.NAME: ManaConcealment
FrierenMod:ManaConcealment.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Shuffle ALL *Mana in draw pile into your discard pile. NL Exhaust.

FrierenMod:BePrepared.NAME: Be Prepared
FrierenMod:BePrepared.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust !M! *Mana {@@} in {!frierenmod:SlotNumber!|-1= Error|0= Draw Pile |1= Hand|2= Discard Pile}, your next Attack deals !SM! additional damage.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Exhaust X *Mana in pile, your next Attack deals X+3 additional damage.

FrierenMod:MetallicizFlower.NAME: Foreign Spell: Metallicize Flower
FrierenMod:MetallicizFlower.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust !M! *Mana {@@} in {!frierenmod:SlotNumber!|-1= Error|0= Draw Pile |1= Hand|2= Discard Pile}, gain !SM! Metallicize.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Exhaust X *Mana in pile, gain X Metallicize.

FrierenMod:NatureBeauty.NAME: Party Tricks: Nature's Beauty
FrierenMod:NatureBeauty.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust !M! *Mana {@@} in {!frierenmod:SlotNumber!|-1= Error|0= Draw Pile |1= Hand|2= Discard Pile}, gain !SM! [E] next turn.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Exhaust X+2 *Mana in pile, gain X [E] next turn.

FrierenMod:IceArrows.NAME: Foreign Spell:Arrows of Ice
FrierenMod:IceArrows.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust !M! *Mana {@@} in {!frierenmod:SlotNumber!|-1= Error|0= Draw Pile |1= Hand|2= Discard Pile}, ALL enemies lose !SM! HP.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Exhaust X *Mana in pile, ALL enemies lose 4X HP.

FrierenMod:HighSpeedMovement.NAME: Foreign Spell: High-Speed Movement
FrierenMod:HighSpeedMovement.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust !M! *Mana {@@} in {!frierenmod:SlotNumber!|-1= Error|0= Draw Pile |1= Hand|2= Discard Pile}, gain !SM! Dexterity.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Exhaust X *Mana in pile, gain X Dexterity.

FrierenMod:SpellBoost.NAME: Spell Boost
FrierenMod:SpellBoost.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust !M! *Mana {@@} in {!frierenmod:SlotNumber!|-1= Error|0= Draw Pile |1= Hand|2= Discard Pile}, deal Double Damage for the next !SM! turn.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Exhaust 4X *Mana in pile, deal Double Damage for the next X turn.

FrierenMod:Hypnosis.NAME: Foreign Spell: Hypnosis
FrierenMod:Hypnosis.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust !M! *Mana {@@} in {!frierenmod:SlotNumber!|-1= Error|0= Draw Pile |1= Hand|2= Discard Pile}, apply !SM! Weak and Vulnerable to all enemies.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Exhaust 2X *Mana in pile, apply X Weak and Vulnerable to all enemies.

FrierenMod:PeacefulDays.NAME: Peaceful Days
FrierenMod:PeacefulDays.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust !M! *Mana {@@} in {!frierenmod:SlotNumber!|-1= Error|0= Draw Pile |1= Hand|2= Discard Pile}, Draw !SM! card.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Exhaust X+1 *Mana in pile, Draw X card.

FrierenMod:TheLivingLegend.NAME: The Living Legend
FrierenMod:TheLivingLegend.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust !M! *Mana {@@} in {!frierenmod:SlotNumber!|-1= Error|0= Draw Pile |1= Hand|2= Discard Pile}, add random !SM! frierenmod:Legendary_Spell into {!frierenmod:SlotNumber!|-1= Error|0= draw pile|1= hand|2= discard pile}.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Exhaust X *Mana in pile, add X random frierenmod:Legendary_Spell into pile.

FrierenMod:ImpeccableIntangible.NAME: Impeccable and Intangible
FrierenMod:ImpeccableIntangible.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust !M! *Mana {@@} in {!frierenmod:SlotNumber!|-1= Error|0= Draw Pile |1= Hand|2= Discard Pile}, gain !SM! Intangible.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Exhaust 6X *Mana in pile, gain X Intangible.

FrierenMod:BarrierMagic.NAME: Barrier Magic
FrierenMod:BarrierMagic.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust !M! *Mana {@@} in {!frierenmod:SlotNumber!|-1= Error|0= Draw Pile |1= Hand|2= Discard Pile}, gain !B! Block and Block is not removed at the start of your next !SM! turns.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Exhaust X+2 *Mana in pile, gain X Block and Block will not be removed at the start of your next X turns.

FrierenMod:PassOnTheTorch.NAME: Pass On the Torch
FrierenMod:PassOnTheTorch.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust !M! *Mana {@@} in {!frierenmod:SlotNumber!|-1= Error|0= Draw Pile |1= Hand|2= Discard Pile}, add !SM! *Mana {@@} into {!frierenmod:SlotNumber!|-1= Error|0= Hand|1= Discard Pile|2= Draw Pile}.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Exhaust X *Mana in pile, add X *Mana into the next pile.

FrierenMod:Transcendence.NAME: Transcendence
FrierenMod:Transcendence.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust !M! *Mana {@@} in {!frierenmod:SlotNumber!|-1= Error|0= Draw Pile |1= Hand|2= Discard Pile}, gain !SM! Mantra.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Exhaust X *Mana in pile, gain X Mantra.

FrierenMod:AdvancedDefensiveMagic.NAME: Advanced Defensive Magic
FrierenMod:AdvancedDefensiveMagic.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust !M! *Mana {@@} in {!frierenmod:SlotNumber!|-1= Error|0= Draw Pile |1= Hand|2= Discard Pile}, gain !B! Block twice.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Exhaust X *Mana in pile, gain X Block twice.

FrierenMod:Strategizing.NAME: Strategizing
FrierenMod:Strategizing.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust !M! *Mana {@@} in {!frierenmod:SlotNumber!|-1= Error|0= Draw Pile |1= Hand|2= Discard Pile}, gain !SM! [E] .
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Exhaust 2X *Mana in pile, gain X [E] .

FrierenMod:BuildUpBody.NAME: Build Up Body
FrierenMod:BuildUpBody.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust !M! *Mana {@@} in {!frierenmod:SlotNumber!|-1= Error|0= Draw Pile |1= Hand|2= Discard Pile}, gain !SM! Strength.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Exhaust X *Mana in pile, gain X Strength.

FrierenMod:MeleeMage.NAME: Melee Mage
FrierenMod:MeleeMage.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust !M! *Mana {@@} in {!frierenmod:SlotNumber!|-1= Error|0= Draw Pile |1= Hand|2= Discard Pile}, Cards containing \"Strike\" deal !SM! additional damage.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Exhaust X *Mana in pile, cards containing "Strike" deal X+1 additional damage.

FrierenMod:GrossedOutLook.NAME: Grossed-out Look
FrierenMod:GrossedOutLook.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust !M! *Mana {@@} in {!frierenmod:SlotNumber!|-1= Error|0= Draw Pile |1= Hand|2= Discard Pile}, All enemies lose !SM! Strength this turn.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Exhaust X *Mana in pile, all enemies lose X+2 Strength this turn.

FrierenMod:Sleeeep.NAME: Sleeeep
FrierenMod:Sleeeep.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust !M! *Mana {@@} in {!frierenmod:SlotNumber!|-1= Error|0= Draw Pile |1= Hand|2= Discard Pile}, draw !SM! cards next turn.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Exhaust X *Mana in pile, draw X cards next turn.

FrierenMod:TransferToAlchemist.NAME: Transfer to Alchemist
FrierenMod:TransferToAlchemist.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust !M! *Mana {@@} in {!frierenmod:SlotNumber!|-1= Error|0= Draw Pile |1= Hand|2= Discard Pile}, apply !SM! Poison to ALL enemies.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Exhaust X *Mana in pile, apply !SM! Poison to ALL enemies.

FrierenMod:GreatMageComposure.NAME: Great Mage's Composure
FrierenMod:GreatMageComposure.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust !M! *Mana {@@} in {!frierenmod:SlotNumber!|-1= Error|0= Draw Pile |1= Hand|2= Discard Pile}, the next !SM! times frierenmod:Chant is FREE.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Exhaust 4X *Mana in pile, this turn the next X times frierenmod:Chant is FREE.

FrierenMod:PinchAndScrape.NAME: Pinch And Scrape
FrierenMod:PinchAndScrape.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust !M! *Mana {@@} in {!frierenmod:SlotNumber!|-1= Error|0= Draw Pile |1= Hand|2= Discard Pile}, the next !SM! times frierenmod:Synchro don't Exhaust.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Exhaust X *Mana in pile, the next 2X times frierenmod:Synchro don't Exhaust.

FrierenMod:BluePrint.NAME: Blue Print
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Always COPY the *Magic_Factor in the next frierenmod:Slot when frierenmod:Chant .

FrierenMod:BloodSpell.NAME: Blood Spell
FrierenMod:BloodSpell.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust !M! *Mana {@@} in {!frierenmod:SlotNumber!|-1= Error|0= Draw Pile |1= Hand|2= Discard Pile}, lose !SM! Hp.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Exhaust X-2 *Mana in pile, lose X+2 Hp.

FrierenMod:BigFire.NAME: Big Fire
FrierenMod:BigFire.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust !M! *Mana {@@} in {!frierenmod:SlotNumber!|-1= Error|0= Draw Pile |1= Hand|2= Discard Pile}, add !SM! *Little_Fire into {!frierenmod:SlotNumber!|-1= Error|0= draw pile|1= hand|2= discard pile}.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Exhaust 2X *Mana in pile, add X *Little_Fire into pile.

FrierenMod:Factor100.NAME: Puzzle: @ ? ?
FrierenMod:Factor100.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust !M! *Mana {@@} in {!frierenmod:SlotNumber!|-1= Error|0= Draw Pile |1= Hand|2= Discard Pile}, {@@} {!frierenmod:SlotNumber!|-1= Error|0= @ |1= ?|2= ?}

FrierenMod:Factor010.NAME: Puzzle: ? @ ?

FrierenMod:Factor001.NAME: Puzzle: ? ? @

EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Exhaust 3X+3 *Mana in pile, ... [#ed1c24]monster[] ...

FrierenMod:UnbelievableTool.NAME: Unbelievable Tool
FrierenMod:UnbelievableTool.DESCRIPTION: Choose one [#ff4e41]Unloaded[#ff4e41] and one [#9ffc4f]Loading[#9ffc4f] *Magic_Factor ,swap their frierenmod:slot.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Choose one [#ff4e41]Unloaded[#ff4e41] and one [#9ffc4f]Loading[#9ffc4f] *Magic_Factor ,swap their frierenmod:slot.

FrierenMod:MysteryBox.NAME: Mystery Box
FrierenMod:MysteryBox.DESCRIPTION: Add 2 random *Magic_Factor to your Magic Deck.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Add 2 random *Magic_Factor to your Magic Deck.

FrierenMod:SeinNote.NAME: Sein's Note
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Remove 2 [#ff4e41]Unloaded[#ff4e41] *Magic_Factor or *Magic_Prop, Heal 10 HP.

FrierenMod:MysticBox.NAME: Mystic Box
FrierenMod:MysticBox.DESCRIPTION: Choose 3 [#ff4e41]Unloaded[#ff4e41] *Magic_Factor , swap their frierenmod:Slot with [#9ffc4f]Loading[#9ffc4f] *Magic_Factor 's randomly.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Choose 3 [#ff4e41]Unloaded[#ff4e41] *Magic_Factor , swap their frierenmod:Slot with [#9ffc4f]Loading[#9ffc4f] *Magic_Factor 's randomly.

FrierenMod:ShadowDragonHorn.NAME: Shadow Dragon's Horn
FrierenMod:ShadowDragonHorn.DESCRIPTION: Only available in combat: Remove 2 [#ff4e41]Unloaded[#ff4e41] *Magic_Factor or *Magic_Prop, gain [E] [E].
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Only available in combat: Remove 2 [#ff4e41]Unloaded[#ff4e41] *Magic_Factor or *Magic_Prop, gain [E] [E].

FrierenMod:TransmutationCircle.NAME: A Certain Scientific Transmutation Circle
FrierenMod:TransmutationCircle.DESCRIPTION: Remove 2 *Magic_Factor , add random *Magic_Factor with the same rarity in their frierenmod:Slot.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Remove 2 *Magic_Factor , add random *Magic_Factor with the same rarity in their frierenmod:Slot.

FrierenMod:UnbelievableToolBox.NAME: Unbelievable Tool Box
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Remove 2 [#ff4e41]Unloaded[#ff4e41] *Magic_Factor or *Magic_Prop, gain 2 *Unbelievable_Tool .

FrierenMod:CrystalBall.NAME: Crystal Ball
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Choose 2 [#9ffc4f]Loading[#9ffc4f] *Magic_Factor , swap their frierenmod:slot.

FrierenMod:SwampSpell.NAME: Spell to Pull Out From a Swamp

FrierenMod:MoldSpell.NAME: Spell to Get Rid of Mold

FrierenMod:Perpetual.NAME: Perpetual
FrierenMod:Perpetual.DESCRIPTION: At the start of the turn, shuffle 2 *Mana in your discard pile.
FrierenMod:Perpetual.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL At the start of the turn, shuffle 2 *Mana in your discard pile.

FrierenMod:Disperse.NAME: Disperse
FrierenMod:Disperse.DESCRIPTION: Shuffle a *Mana in your draw pile. NL Add 2 *Mana in your hand. NL Shuffle 3 *Mana in your discard pile. NL Exhaust.
FrierenMod:Disperse.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Shuffle a *Mana in your draw pile. NL Add 2 *Mana in your hand. NL Shuffle 3 *Mana in your discard pile.

FrierenMod:Flow.NAME: Flow
FrierenMod:Flow.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Put one *Mana from your draw pile and discard pile in your hand.

FrierenMod:FlyingMagic.NAME: Flying Magic
FrierenMod:FlyingMagic.DESCRIPTION: Gain 3 Intangible. NL Exhaust !M! Mana in discard pile at the end of your turn.

FrierenMod:FolkGrimoire.NAME: Folk Grimoire
FrierenMod:FolkGrimoire.DESCRIPTION: Add a random frierenmod:Chant card and a random frierenmod:Legendary_Spell into your hand, they cost !M! less this turn. NL Exhaust.

FrierenMod:Outpouring.NAME: Outpouring
FrierenMod:Outpouring.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you frierenmod:Synchro a *Mana this turn, gain !M! Strength. NL Exhaust.
FrierenMod:Outpouring.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Whenever you frierenmod:Synchro a *Mana this turn, gain !M! Strength. NL Exhaust.

FrierenMod:ContinualChant.NAME: Continual Chant
FrierenMod:ContinualChant.DESCRIPTION: frierenmod:Legendary_Spell. NL Shuffle !M! *Mana into your draw pile. NL frierenmod:Chant !CX!.

FrierenMod:PajamasForm.NAME: Pajamas Form
FrierenMod:PajamasForm.DESCRIPTION: At the end of your turn, Exhaust ALL *Mana and deal damage equal to 4 times the amount you Exhaust to ALL enemies. NL (Deal !M! damage)

FrierenMod:PreparedPosture.NAME: Prepared Posture
FrierenMod:PreparedPosture.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Draw a frierenmod:Chant card.

FrierenMod:Trick.NAME: Trick
FrierenMod:Trick.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, add *ManaConcealment into your hand.

FrierenMod:FlowerFieldSpell.NAME: Spell to Produce Flower Fields
FrierenMod:FlowerFieldSpell.DESCRIPTION: frierenmod:Chant !CX!. NL Add a *BlueMoonWeed into your hand.
FrierenMod:FlowerFieldSpell.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: frierenmod:Chant !CX!. NL Add a *BlueMoonWeed+ into your hand.

FrierenMod:ClearMind.NAME: Clear Mind
FrierenMod:ClearMind.DESCRIPTION: Add !M! *Mana into your hand. This turn, frierenmod:Synchro changes into frierenmod:Accel_Synchro.

FrierenMod:AccessoriesSpell.NAME: Spell for Finding Lost Accessories
FrierenMod:AccessoriesSpell.DESCRIPTION: Innate. Ethereal. NL frierenmod:Legendary_Spell. NL At the end of combat, obtain a random relic.

FrierenMod:OilSpell.NAME: Spell to Remove Tough Oil Stains
FrierenMod:OilSpell.DESCRIPTION: frierenmod:Legendary_Spell. NL Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. If no one get killed by this, deal !M! damage once more.

FrierenMod:ApexMagic.NAME: The Apex of Magic
FrierenMod:ApexMagic.DESCRIPTION: If your hand, draw pile and discard pile each have just 4 *Mana, set all enemies HP to 0.
FrierenMod:ApexMagic.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL If your hand, draw pile, and discard pile each have just 4 *Mana, set all enemies HP to 0.

FrierenMod:PancakeSpell.NAME: Spell to Flip Pancakes Perfectly
FrierenMod:PancakeSpell.DESCRIPTION: Exchange !M! *Mana in your hand with one card in your draw pile.

FrierenMod:TongueTwisterSpell.NAME: Spell to Say Tongue Twisters Successfully
FrierenMod:TongueTwisterSpell.DESCRIPTION: Traw !M! card. NL Gain !B! block for each *Mana you have trawed.

FrierenMod:MultipleOffensiveMagic.NAME: Multiple Offensive Magic
FrierenMod:MultipleOffensiveMagic.DESCRIPTION: Deal X+4 damage to a random enemy X times, add X *Mana into your hand.
FrierenMod:MultipleOffensiveMagic.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal X+4 damage to a random enemy X+1 times, add X *Mana into your hand.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: NL (Deal !D! damage
times)

FrierenMod:RitesPreparation.NAME: Preparation of Rites
FrierenMod:RitesPreparation.DESCRIPTION: The next !M! *Mana you frierenmod:Synchro will deal 5 damage to All enemies.

FrierenMod:FireSpell.NAME: Spell That Starts a Fire
FrierenMod:FireSpell.DESCRIPTION: Add a *LittleSpark into your hand for every enemy in the room. NL Exhaust.
FrierenMod:FireSpell.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Add a *LittleSpark+ into your hand for every enemy in the room. NL Exhaust.

FrierenMod:Laziness.NAME: Laziness
FrierenMod:Laziness.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL frierenmod:Chant once to Exhaust this card. NL At the end of your turn, shuffle a copy of this card into your discard pile.

FrierenMod:Recall.NAME: Recall
FrierenMod:Recall.DESCRIPTION: Put !M! card from Exhaust pile into your hand and Retain it. NL Exhaust.

FrierenMod:RustCleanMagic.NAME: Anti-Corrosion Spell
FrierenMod:RustCleanMagic.DESCRIPTION: frierenmod:Legendary_Spell. NL Remove one of a non-boss enemy's buff and one of your debuffs. NL Exhaust.

FrierenMod:RedAppleSpell.NAME: Spell to Turn Red Apple into Green Apple
FrierenMod:RedAppleSpell.DESCRIPTION: Switch the amount of your Strength and Dexterity, add an *Apple into hand. NL At the end of your turn, switch back.
FrierenMod:RedAppleSpell.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Switch the amount of your Strength and Dexterity, add an *Apple+ into hand. NL At the end of your turn, switch back.

FrierenMod:LightningMagic.NAME: Destructive Lightning Magic
FrierenMod:LightningMagic.DESCRIPTION: frierenmod:Legendary_Spell. NL Draw *Mana from draw pile and discard pile until your hand is full. frierenmod:Synchro change into frierenmod:Limit_Over_Synchro in the rest of the combat.

FrierenMod:BlueMoonWeed.NAME: BlueMoonWeed
FrierenMod:BlueMoonWeed.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Draw !M! cards. NL Exhaust.

FrierenMod:GrapeSpell.NAME: Spell to Make Sweet Grapes Sour
FrierenMod:GrapeSpell.DESCRIPTION: Choose 2 cards in your hand and Exhaust them, then add 2 *Mana in your hand. NL Exhaust.

FrierenMod:BabySleeping.NAME: Sleeping Like a Baby
FrierenMod:BabySleeping.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block, Retain 1 card in your hand. If your discard pile has no *Mana, Retain your hand.

FrierenMod:SerieGrimoire.NAME: Serie's Grimoire
FrierenMod:SerieGrimoire.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Craft a frierenmod:Legendary_Spell! You will have more options. NL Exhaust.

FrierenMod:LittleFire.NAME: Little Spark
FrierenMod:LittleFire.DESCRIPTION: frierenmod:Backfire. Deal !D! damage and increase damage of ALL *LittleSpark by !M! this combat. NL Whenever you frierenmod:Synchro, return this back to hand from discard pile.

FrierenMod:FullAhead.NAME: Full Ahead
FrierenMod:FullAhead.DESCRIPTION: After frierenmod:Chant first time every turn, gain 1 Strength and 1 Dexterity .

FrierenMod:LockTarget.NAME: Lock Target
FrierenMod:LockTarget.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage, draw a card. NL If draw pile's *Mana amount equals or more than discard pile's, attack once more.

FrierenMod:FiveMinutesMore.NAME: Five Minutes More
FrierenMod:FiveMinutesMore.DESCRIPTION: Gain [E] [E] . Add a *Laziness into your draw pile.
FrierenMod:FiveMinutesMore.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain [E] [E] . Add a *Laziness into your hand.

FrierenMod:DrawOption.NAME: The Star
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Draw 1/2/3 card(s).

FrierenMod:ManaInDiscardOption.NAME: The Moon
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Shuffle 2/4/6/8 *Mana into your discard pile.

FrierenMod:ManaInHandOption.NAME: The Sun
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: add 2/3/4/5 *Mana into your hand.

FrierenMod:ManaInDrawOption.NAME: The fool
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Shuffle 2/4/6/8 *Mana into your draw pile.

FrierenMod:ScryOption.NAME: The High Priestess
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Scry 2/3/4.

FrierenMod:CostZeroOption.NAME: The Pentacles
FrierenMod:CostZeroOption.DESCRIPTION: Reduce the cost of !M! random card in your hand to 0 this turn.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: reduce the cost of 1/2 card(s) in your hand to 0 this turn.

FrierenMod:SelfRetainOption.NAME: Temperance
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Retain 1/2 cards in your hand.

FrierenMod:GainRandomCardOption.NAME: The Wheel of Fortune
FrierenMod:GainRandomCardOption.DESCRIPTION: Add !M! random common card into your hand. They cost 0 this turn.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Add 1/2 random common card(s) into your hand. They cost 0 this turn.

FrierenMod:DamageOption.NAME: Justice
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Deal 6/10 damage.

FrierenMod:DamageThirdOption.NAME: The Devil
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Deal 5/7 damage 3 times.

FrierenMod:DamageAllOption.NAME: Death
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Deal 4/8/12/16 damage to ALL enemies.

FrierenMod:BlockOption.NAME: The Hermit
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Gain 4/8/12/16 Block.

FrierenMod:EnergyOption.NAME: The Lovers
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Next turn, gain 1/2/3 [E] .

FrierenMod:ExtinguishOption.NAME: Judgement
FrierenMod:ExtinguishOption.DESCRIPTION: If the enemy has !M! or less HP, set its HP to 0.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: If the enemy has 30/40 or less HP, set its HP to 0.

FrierenMod:DexterityOption.NAME: The Magician
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Gain 2/3/4 Dexterity. NL Exhaust.

FrierenMod:ChantOption.NAME: The Cups
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: frierenmod:Chant 2/3/4.

FrierenMod:IntangibleOption.NAME: The Hanged Man
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Gain 1/2 Intangible. NL Exhaust.

FrierenMod:VulnerableOption.NAME: The Hierophant
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Apply 1/2/3 Vulnerable to ALL enemies.

FrierenMod:UpgradeOption.NAME: The Tower
FrierenMod:UpgradeOption.DESCRIPTION: Upgrade all cards in your hand for the rest of the combat.

FrierenMod:UpgradeAllOption.NAME: The World
FrierenMod:UpgradeAllOption.DESCRIPTION: Upgrade ALL cards for the rest of the combat. NL Exhaust.

FrierenMod:RemoveDebuffOption.NAME: The Wands
FrierenMod:RemoveDebuffOption.DESCRIPTION: Remove ALL the debuff applied on you.

FrierenMod:PreciseChant.NAME: Precise Chant
FrierenMod:PreciseChant.DESCRIPTION: frierenmod:Chant ALL *Mana in the corresponding pile as possible. NL Exhaust.
FrierenMod:PreciseChant.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: frierenmod:Chant ALL *Mana in the corresponding pile as possible.

FrierenMod:ManaExpansion.NAME: Mana Expansion
FrierenMod:ManaExpansion.DESCRIPTION: DOUBLE the amount of your *Mana . NL Exhaust.

FrierenMod:ManaDetection.NAME: Mana Detection
FrierenMod:ManaDetection.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Whenever it is attacked, shuffle !M! *Mana into your discard pile. NL Exhaust.

FrierenMod:TimeConcept.NAME: Time Concept of Elf
FrierenMod:TimeConcept.DESCRIPTION: Send your everything two turns into the future. Two Turns later, put a *Regret into your draw pile and hand.
FrierenMod:TimeConcept.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Send your everything two turns into the future. Two Turns later, put a *Regret into your draw pile.
